newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egypt pound overnight rates widen.
newsitem.headline: Egypt pound overnight rates widen.

text.p: Overnight interbank rates on the Egyptian pound widened on Monday in a short private sector market to between 10-1/8 and 10-1/2 percent from Sunday's range of 10-1/4 and 10-3/8 percent, bankers said.
One-week rates eased to between 10-1/8 to 10-1/2 percent from 10-5/16 and 10-3/8 percent on Sunday, they added.
State-owned banks maintained their minimum overnight lending rate at 10-1/2 percent.
The central bank has lowered the discount rate for the second time in less than a month to 13.00 percent from 13.25.
